mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `d_account_balance` ( settle_date, memberId, platform_user_no, name, phone, balance, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES
( DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H'), #{model.memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.platformUserNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.authName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.phoneNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.balance, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now(), now() )
